## NgxPrimerAccordionRootComponent.disabled property

Whether the accordion is disabled or not. If true, the accordion and its items cannot be interacted with.


 {<!-- -->boolean<!-- -->} True if the accordion is disabled, false otherwise.

**Signature:**

```typescript
readonly disabled: import("@angular/core").ModelSignal<boolean>;
```
